00042 void CommandAttrDel::run() {
00043   uint64_t handle;
00044 
00045   if (m_args.size() != 2)
00046     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage.");
00047 
00048   if (m_args[0].second != "" || m_args[1].second != "")
00049     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Invalid character '=' in argument.");
00050 
00051   handle = Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first);
00052 
00053   m_session->attr_del(handle, m_args[1].first);
